author: adewit
body:
#### PR description:

Adds HTXS stage 1.2 classification (stage 1.1, 1 and 0 stay available)

#### PR validation:

Verified to run correctly using runRivetHTXS_cfg.py 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Backport of #28444 for use with nanoAOD
title: Adding HTXS stage 1.2 classification (102x backport)
